attributes.action: Rio 2016 GB Football - Women's & Men's Teams To Take Part
attributes.additional_details: A Petition to help show the amount of support that the British public have in the Women's and Men's Great Britain Football Teams. We would like to see a joint British Team go to the Rio 2016 games to represent the Football of Great Britain. The premier league is regarded very highly in the world and would look poor if we don't even put a team together
